front.title: Mobile IPv6 Bootstrapping using Diameter in the Split Scenario

abstract.t: In Mobile IPv6 deployment a need for an interaction between the Home Agent, the AAA infrastructure of the Mobile Service Provider (MSP) and the Mobility Service Authorizer (MSA) has been identified. This document describes how Diameter can be used to perform AAA functionalities for the Mobile IPv6 service in the "split" scenario. For this, it describes two possible approaches. It also explains how Diameter meet the goals outlined in the MIPv6 AAA goals document.
